additionalfeatures: Direct print, USB 2.0 compatibility, RGB primary colour filter, DPOF support, digital image rotation, PictBridge support, in-camera red-eye removal, cropping an image, resizing an image, Automatic Scene Recognition (SR Auto), in-camera film editing, Exif Print support, automatic display brightness adjustment, Motion Panorama 360, HDR image enhancement technology, high-speed recording, Zoom Noise Reduction (ZNR) function, date stamp, Action camera mode
supportedmemorycards: SD Memory Card, SDXC Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card
specialeffects: Fisheye, soft focus, miniature, partial colour, Toy camera, High Key, Low Key, Pop Colour, Cross Screen, Dynamic tone
shootingprograms: Landscape, portrait mode, night mode, text, party/indoor, flower, Underwater, sports mode, sunset, beach, night (tripod), underwater macro, snow, natural light & with flash, pro low light, Dynamic Range (HDR)
lightsensitivity: ISO 100, ISO 800, ISO 400, ISO 200, ISO 1600, ISO 3200, ISO auto, ISO auto (100-400), ISO auto (100-800), ISO auto (100-1600), ISO 6400 (8Mpix)
details: 1 x Fujifilm NP-45S Li-ion rechargeable battery ( included )
whitebalancepresets: Fine, incandescent, shade, fluorescent light (cool white), fluorescent light (warm white), Underwater, fluorescent light (daylight white)
continuousshootingspeed: 10 frames per second for 10 frames, 5.5 frames per second for 10 frames, 3.3 frames per second for 10 frames, 60 frames per second for 70 frames (3MPix)
includedaccessories: Hand strap, AC power adaptor, USB cable
flashmodes: Fill-in mode, slow synchro, auto mode, flash OFF mode, red-eye reduction
effectiveflashrange: 0.7 m - 3.1 m : ISO auto ( wide lens ) 0.7 m - 2.7 m : ISO auto ( tele lens ) 0.3 m - 0.8 m : ISO auto ( macro lens )
